title: Spiritual Beauty - Mentellow
description: Spiritual Beauty takes you on a spiritual journey with spa products filled with natural ingredients and fragrances inspired by Asian philosophies.
cleaned_text: Spiritual Beauty - Embrace your spirituality Spiritual Beauty takes you on a spiritual journey with spa products filled with natural ingredients and fragrances inspired by Asian philosophies of wellbeing and restoration. The design is inspired by Scandinavian interiors with delicate colours, elements of wood and shiny details to create a luxurious feeling. All products are vegan friendly and without artificial colours. Spiritual Beauty products are designed to enhance, relax and calm your senses while taking care of your skin, so you can get the spa atmosphere at home.
